clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Outcome and Causes of Visual Loss in Uveitis

lead_sponsor.agency: Moorfields Eye Hospital NHS Foundation Trust

clinical_study.source: Moorfields Eye Hospital NHS Foundation Trust

brief_summary.textblock: This study is aimed at investigating the long term clinical outcome of patients with uveitis.

detailed_description.textblock:
Patients will be included if they are treated for uveitis and have had repeat follow-up. Data will be gathered from the entire length of the patients follow-up.
The main outcome measures will be:
Change from baseline of Best corrected visual acuity (BCVA)at 10 years Causes of vision loss (≤6/15, VL) and severe vision loss (≤6/60, SVL) at 10 years Number of clinical visits at 10 years.

primary_outcome.description: Recorded repeat best corrected visual acuity at intervals throughout the length of follow-up.

secondary_outcome.description: Record any ocular changes related to permanent visual loss under 6/12 and severe visual loss under 6/60.

arm_group.description: Patient with a clinical diagnosis of Uveitis.

study_pop.textblock: Patient data will be gathered from the uveitis clinic at Moorfields Eye Hospital.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Clinical Diagnosis of Uveitis.
Exclusion Criteria:
- No follow-up data.
